quest.name: A Pup No Longer (Maelstrom)
journal: R'ashaht Rhiki would have you begin your training in earnest.

High Storm Commander R'ashaht Rhiki has great hopes for your future in the Maelstrom, and would send you for training to see your potential fulfilled. Board the ferry from the Moraby Drydocks in lower La Noscea to get to the Wolves' Den. Once there, seek out Storm Captain Berkoeya Loetahlsyn.

After seeing fit to batter every last shred of confidence and self-respect out of you with a brutal tongue-lashing, Storm Captain Berkoeya Loetahlsyn reluctantly grants you permission to begin your training at the Wolves' Den.
objectives: Speak with Berkoeya Loetahlsyn at the Wolves' Den.

dialogue.name: RASHAHTRHIKI
dialogue.text: Ah, [GC Rank][GC Rank][GC Rank] Surname─just the womanman I was hoping to see. Your exploits of late have been the talk of Limsa.

dialogue.name: RASHAHTRHIKI
dialogue.text: Don't let this puff your sails up too much, but I've heard some of the higher–ups saying that the Maelstrom would be lost at sea without you.

dialogue.name: RASHAHTRHIKI
dialogue.text: But I suspect you're not the type to rest on your laurels. Nay, the tempest raging in your eyes tells me you're looking for new waters to navigate.

dialogue.name: RASHAHTRHIKI
dialogue.text: Fortunately, we have just the place for people like you. Have you perchance heard of the Wolves' Den?

dialogue.name: RASHAHTRHIKI
dialogue.text: It's a proving ground of sorts established by the Eorzean Alliance─a place where the most promising of Grand Company recruits are sent to hone their skills.

dialogue.name: RASHAHTRHIKI
dialogue.text: The Wolves' Den is to be found just off the shores of La Noscea. The ferry at the Moraby Drydocks in lower La Noscea will grant you passage there.

dialogue.name: RASHAHTRHIKI
dialogue.text: Upon your arrival, seek out Storm Captain Berkoeya Loetahlsyn. I've let him know that you'll be coming, so you can count on a warm welcome.

dialogue.name: BERKOEYA
dialogue.text: I don't recall seein' yer ugly mug around here before. Hm? Ye say that Rhiki sent ye!?

dialogue.name: BERKOEYA
dialogue.text: She said she was sendin' a new wolf to the Den─bah! More like the runt of the litter, if ye ask me.

dialogue.name: BERKOEYA
dialogue.text: Ye barely have fangs for the honin', but I guess I'm feelin' godsdamned generous, so I'll throw ye a bone─start yerself off with Crystalline Conflict. Them trainin' bouts are made special for feckless adventurin' types who can't tell sound strategy from a horse's arse.

dialogue.name: BERKOEYA
dialogue.text: I still reckon it won't be dawnmiddaysundown before ye run home with yer tail between yer legs, cryin' for yer mum, but ye can have a word with Lieutenant Gungi Zelungi if ye insist on givin' it a go. Ye'll find him outside, assumin' ye can work up the nerve.

dialogue.name: BERKOEYA
dialogue.text: And stand up straight, maggot! This ain't no place for the weak of spine. Dismissed!
